data.title: Noah’s Ark Children’s Hospital Charity
data.meta_description: I have just registered for the Cardiff Half Marathon 2024 Why not join me...
data.text:
Invite your friends

If you know of more people that you would like to join your team, invite them here. They will need to register and pay separately. Please supply their email addresses separated by a comma ([email protected], [email protected]) and we will email them the joining instructions

Email Addresses

Similar teams already exist, Do you want to join one of these instead?

Optional...invite more friends

If you know of more people that you would like to join your team, invite them here. They will need to register and pay separately. Please supply their email address (comma separate) and we will email them the joining instructions

Email Addresses
